stencil testing



GfxStencilFunction

typedef struct {
  GfxTestFunction test;
  int32           ref;
  uint32          mask;
} GfxStencilFunction;
type: C struct

GfxTestOperation

type: C enum
GFX_TEST_OPERATION_KEEP
GFX_TEST_OPERATION_ZERO
GFX_TEST_OPERATION_REPLACE
GFX_TEST_OPERATION_INCREASE
GFX_TEST_OPERATION_INCREASE_WRAP
GFX_TEST_OPERATION_DECREASE
GFX_TEST_OPERATION_DECREASE_WRAP
GFX_TEST_OPERATION_INVERT
GFX_TEST_OPERATION_COUNT

GfxStencilOperation

typedef struct {
  GfxTestOperation stencil_fail;
  GfxTestOperation stencil_pass_depth_fail;
  GfxTestOperation stencil_depth_pass;
} GfxStencilOperation;
type: C struct
